IS THE MOOD STACK FOR ME?

This stack is ideal for those seeking comprehensive nutritional support for brain health, including optimization of their mental clarity, mood, and focus.

settings.quote: My brain fog is completely gone after using this! Highly recommend!

settings.supporting_product_description: Bone Marrow & Liver is packed with vital nutrients and peptides to provide support for bone and tissue repair, skin health, and better mood.
Firestarter includes suet (perinephric kidney fat) and helps to increase energy, improve exercise performance, mood, insulin sensitivity, and mitochondrial fat burning.

settings.primary_product_description: Mood Memory & Brain is packed with critical nutrients and peptides to provide strategic support for better learning, focus, mood, as well as mental acuity. It includes grass-fed and finished brain, bone marrow, and liver and stimulates healthy neural connections.

settings.title: ELEVATE YOUR MOOD, SHARPEN YOUR MIND.
Phosphatidylserine
settings.nutrient_description: A phospholipid found robustly in brain and nervous tissue essential for stress management, working memory, and optimal cognitive performance.

settings.title: Sphingolipids
settings.nutrient_description: A special type of lipid (fat) found abundantly in brain and nervous tissue provides physical and chemical stability, resistance, as well as supports proper nerve cell performance and communication.

settings.title: Brain-derived neurotrophic factor (BDNF)
settings.nutrient_description: A critical growth factor found in brain to enhance nerve cell health, communication, synaptic transmission, and protection. Low BDNF has been identified in many neurodegenerative disease states.

settings.title: DHA/EPA
settings.nutrient_description: Essential omega-3 fatty acids found robustly beef (bovine) brain critical for focus as well as moderating inflammation associated with anxiousness, depressiveness, and other mood-related symptoms.

settings.title: Choline
settings.nutrient_description: Essential for the synthesis and release of neurotransmitters, such as acetylcholine, which is necessary for memory, cognition, mood stability, muscle control, and much more.

settings.title: B12
settings.nutrient_description: A critical B vitamin for overall nerve health, neurotransmitter synthesis, mood, cognition, and energy.

settings.title: Folate (B9)
settings.nutrient_description: An essential B vitamin to support optimal repair and growth of nerve cells as well as neurotransmitter synthesis.

settings.title: Riboflavin (B2)
settings.nutrient_description: A crucial B vitamin required for myelin sheath synthesis—insulating layer surrounding nerve cells—to allow for proper transmission and communication between nervous tissue.

settings.title: Pantothenic Acid (B5)
settings.nutrient_description: A key vitamin required for the synthesis of coenzyme A (CoA). Beyond its role in cell metabolism, CoA contributes to the synthesis of cholesterol, amino acids, phospholipids, neurotransmitters, and steroid hormones.

settings.title: Selenium
settings.nutrient_description: An important mineral strongly involved in antioxidant defense activity as well as inflammation moderation which serves to improve brain health.

settings.title: Copper
settings.nutrient_description: A crucial mineral for brain development during fetal and post-natal growth, as well as maintenance of brain and nerve health throughout life, including effective antioxidant defense.

settings.title: Red and yellow bone marrow
settings.nutrient_description: Abundant in peptides, growth factors, and stem cells to promote and support the formation of red blood cells, cartilage cells (chondrocytes), bone cells (osteocytes, osteoblast & osteoclasts), and other vital tissues found throughout the body.

settings.title: Essential fatty acids including omega-3 fatty acids, EPA & DHA
settings.nutrient_description: Play a critical role in the immune system, brain and cardiovascular health, as well as muscle recovery.

settings.title: Alkylglycerols
settings.nutrient_description: Support the immune system and formation of red blood cells, white blood cells, and platelets.

settings.title: Adiponectin
settings.nutrient_description: Peptide hormone shown to support immune, metabolic, and cardiovascular health.

settings.title: Tissue-specific proteins, hormones, growth factors, and peptides such as bovine cathelicidins
settings.nutrient_description: Show broad antimicrobial activity and are involved in the immune response.

settings.title: Vitamins A, D, E, K2
settings.nutrient_description: Get these vitamins in a super bioavailable form that play critical roles in overall immune and bone health.

settings.title: Biotin, and CoQ10
settings.nutrient_description: Crucial for metabolism, mood, and energy, as well as the health of skin, hair, and nails.

settings.title: Liver Expressed Antimicrobial Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: Also known as LEAP-2. This peptide is involved in immune response and glucose metabolism.

settings.title: Hepcidin Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: A peptide directly involved in iron metabolism as well as the innate immune response.

settings.title: Ergothioneine Peptide
settings.nutrient_description: An amino acid found in liver, kidney, and bone marrow found to support detoxification and longevity pathways.

settings.title: Stearic Acid
settings.nutrient_description: A crucial fatty acid that turns on mitochondrial fat-burning cells to help with weight and energy.

settings.section_description: The combined power of Mood, Memory & Brain, Bone Marrow & Liver, and Firestarter includes  vital and potent essential nutrients.

settings.quote: 100% game changer as  far as brain fog and clarity.
settings.author: Philana S.

settings.title: HEART & SOIL 101
settings.instructions: Take 6 capsules, once daily, of each supplement. If you’re new to taking organ supplements, start with 1-2 capsules of each daily for the first week before increasing by one capsule daily. Consistent long-term use provides the best results.
settings.benefits: Mood provides strategic nutritional support to reduce stress under pressure, improve cognition, memory & clarity as well as combat depressive or anxious moods.
settings.quality: Rigorous third-party testing by independent labs during and after manufacturing. Quality and purity information can be provided upon request.
settings.dietary: 100% additive, hormone, allergen, antibiotic, pesticide, and GMO-free. Freeze-dried. Pure nose-to-tail nourishment.

settings.title: Who should take the Mood Stack?
settings.answer: This stack is ideal if you are seeking comprehensive nutritional support for brain health, including optimizing your mental clarity, mood, and focus.

settings.title: What are the benefits of taking all three supplements together?
settings.answer: The combination of products in this stack work synergistically to deliver a wide range of highly bioavailable Vitamins, Minerals, Peptides, and Essential Fatty Acids that support optimal brain health.
